sect1.title: Introduction
sect1.para: The note-arduino Arduino library for communicating with the Blues Wireless Notecard via serial or I2C.
This library allows you to control a Notecard by writing an Arduino sketch in C or C++. Your sketch may programmatically configure Notecard and send Notes to Notehub.io.

sect1.title: Dependencies
sect1.para: This library is a wrapper around and depends upon the note-c library, which it includes as a git submodule.
In addition, this library requires a physical connection to a Notecard over I2C or Serial to be functional.
